effect.ruby_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If a weather move is active, this move has double power, and its type becomes the type of the weather move. shadow sky is typeless for the purposes of this move.
effect.emerald: Inflicts regular damage. If a weather move is active, this move has double power, and its type becomes the type of the weather move. shadow sky is typeless for the purposes of this move.
effect.firered_leafgreen: Inflicts regular damage. If a weather move is active, this move has double power, and its type becomes the type of the weather move. shadow sky is typeless for the purposes of this move.
effect.colosseum: Inflicts regular damage. If a weather move is active, this move has double power, and its type becomes the type of the weather move. shadow sky is typeless for the purposes of this move.
effect.xd: Inflicts regular damage. If a weather move is active, this move has double power, and its type becomes the type of the weather move. shadow sky is typeless for the purposes of this move.

short_effect.ruby_sapphire: If there be weather, this move has doubled power and the weather’s type.
short_effect.emerald: If there be weather, this move has doubled power and the weather’s type.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: The move’s type and power change with the weather.
flavor_text.emerald: The move’s type and power change with the weather.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An attack that varies in power and type depending on the weather.
